name: The Night Before MEat
description:
Listen Carefully Kids...
Santa is COMING!
When he arrives, be certain to CATCH him!
We need his tast--his Great Looking Presents....

...You(Santa) arrive in a neighborhood, losing your powers all of a sudden.
Having just a few presents left, you choose to deliver them before you go back to headquarters.
The thing is...you never make it back.

  • Full Santa Experience.
  • Deliver Presents to Different Structured Houses.
  • Traps & Naughty Kids Await.
  • Find Keys To Open Doors & Windows.
  • Randomly Placed Key Locations On Each Playthrough/Loss.
  • Save & Load System(Saves Automatically After Each House Is Cleared.)
  • In-Game Tutorial & Controls.
  • MEat Universe Continuation.
Part of the Mind Projections Collection. #2.

If there is any bugs, please let me know :)

Click any Icon Below to open it's link! ☕️
